TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRegisteredObject

summary.span: 定義由裝載環境所管理之物件的方法。

span.span: Defines methods for objects that are managed by the hosting environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件必須實作介面，以便向裝載的環境，並讓它們的存留時間受主控的環境。Objects must implement the interface in order to register with the hosting environment and have their lifetime managed by the hosting environment. 您可以建立註冊物件的執行個體，藉由呼叫方法上的應用程式管理員。You can create an instance of a registered object by calling the method on the application manager. 應用程式管理員會傳回新建立的物件，呼叫者，然後在物件上呼叫特定類型的方法。The application manager returns the newly created object to the caller, which can then call a type-specific method on the object. 在啟動期間，已註冊的物件應該呼叫方法來完成的物件。During startup, the registered object should call the method to complete registration of the object. 當應用程式管理員需要停止已註冊的物件時，它會呼叫方法。When the application manager needs to stop a registered object, it will call the method. 應用程式可以有只有一個已註冊型別執行個體。Applications can have only one instance of a registered type. 若要建立多個已註冊型別執行個體，請使用處理站模式管理員已向應用程式，然後管理多個執行個體建立的物件。To create multiple instances of a registered type, use the factory pattern to create an object manager that is registered with the application and then manages the multiple instances. 如需物件的範例實作原廠模式，請參閱範例的類別。For an example of an object implementing the factory pattern, see the example for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Stop(bool immediate) cil managed

param.name: immediate
param.span: 表示應在傳回註冊物件之前先將其從裝載環境移除註冊，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate the registered object should unregister from the hosting environment before returning; otherwise, .

summary.span: 需要註冊物件以移除註冊。

span.span: Requests a registered object to unregister.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式管理員會呼叫詢問要取消註冊已註冊的物件的方法。The application manager will call the method to ask a registered object to unregister. 在處理期間方法中，已註冊的物件必須呼叫方法。During processing of the method, the registered object must call the method. 與第一次呼叫方法`immediate`參數設定為`false`。The method is first called with the `immediate` parameter set to `false`. 物件可以是完整的處理，呼叫方法，然後傳回或它可以立即傳回並在完成之前呼叫以非同步方式處理方法。The object can either complete processing, call the method, and then return or it can return immediately and complete processing asynchronously before calling the method. 如果已註冊的物件不會完成處理之前的應用程式管理員的逾時期限到期，以一次呼叫方法`immediate`參數設定為`true`。If the registered object does not complete processing before the application manager's time-out period expires, the method is called again with the `immediate` parameter set to `true`. 當`immediate`參數是`true`，已註冊的物件必須呼叫方法，再傳回; 否則將移除其登錄應用程式管理員。When the `immediate` parameter is `true`, the registered object must call the method before returning; otherwise, its registration will be removed by the application manager.
